author: Ryan Daws
description:
The Next.js team has pushed out version 15.4 and while it might not be a huge update, it makes vital improvements to things like Turbopack. Developers that have tried the –turbopack flag may have seen the speed boosts, but maybe ran into a few quirks that made them hesitant to use it for anything serious.... Read more »

The post Next.js 15.4 update boosts Turbopack ahead of version 16 appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Next.js 15.4 update boosts Turbopack ahead of version 16
